response.overview: Celebrating the success of her Top-Ten gold selling album 'Voice', Alison Moyet has recorded a unique version of her recent sell out UK concert tour. 'One Blue Voice' Moyet's first ever 'live' DVD, was filmed on June 6th 2005 in front of a specially invited audience, at The Hospital in Covent Garden. Performing with an eight-piece band including a string quartet, the material includes tracks from her album 'Voice', and songs from the acclaimed Brit nominated CD, 'Hometime'. Bonus tracks include never recorded live classics from her back catalogue. This is an intimate concert, the result of which is a stylised, beautifully lit performance of Moyet on spectacular form.
response.title: Alison Moyet: One Blue Voice
